# The `TrailingObjects.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This header defines support for implementing classes that have some trailing object (or arrays of objects) appended to them. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This header defines support for implementing classes that have some trailing object (or arrays of objects) appended to them.

The main purpose is to make it obvious where this idiom is being used, and to make the usage more idiomatic and more difficult to get wrong.

The TrailingObject template abstracts away the reinterpret&#95;cast, pointer arithmetic, and size calculations used for the allocation and access of appended arrays of objects, and takes care that they are all allocated at their required alignment. Additionally, it ensures that the base type is final â€“ deriving from a class that expects data appended immediately after it is typically not safe.

Users are expected to derive from this template, and provide numTrailingObjects implementations for each trailing type except the last, e.g. like this sample:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">VarLengthObj : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailingObjects&lt;VarLengthObj, int, double&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailingObjects;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumInts, NumDoubles;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> numTrailingObjects(OverloadToken&lt;int&gt;)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumInts; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


You can access the appended arrays via &#39;getTrailingObjects&#39;, and determine the size needed for allocation via &#39;additionalSizeToAlloc&#39; and &#39;totalSizeToAlloc&#39;.

All the methods implemented by this class are intended for use by the implementation of the class, not as part of its interface (thus, private inheritance is suggested).

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of a different type. e.g.:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ExtractSecondType&lt;Foo..., int&gt;::type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/extractsecondtype"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ty1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ty2&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/extractsecondtype">ExtractSecondType</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/extractsecondtype/#a9a887ef9f6009657a6c0a4936159672b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ty2 <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/extractsecondtype/#a9a887ef9f6009657a6c0a4936159672b">type</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TrailingObjectsImpl is somewhat complicated, because it is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursively inheriting template, in order to handle the template</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// varargs. Each level of inheritance picks off a single trailing type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then recurses on the rest. The &quot;Align&quot;, &quot;BaseTy&quot;, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;TopTrailingObj&quot; arguments are passed through unchanged through the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursion. &quot;PrevTy&quot; is, at each level, the type handled by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// level right above it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TopTrailingObj, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... MoreTys&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl">TrailingObjectsImpl</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The main template definition is never used -- the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specializations cover all possibilities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TopTrailingObj, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NextTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... MoreTys&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl-d5dc5f9bc1738bd42d17ac7472482035"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl">TrailingObjectsImpl</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, BaseTy, TopTrailingObj, PrevTy, NextTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          MoreTys...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl">TrailingObjectsImpl</a>&lt;Align, BaseTy, TopTrailingObj, NextTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 MoreTys...&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl">TrailingObjectsImpl</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, BaseTy, TopTrailingObj, NextTy, MoreTys...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ParentType;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">RequiresRealignment &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">alignof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(PrevTy) &lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">alignof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(NextTy);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure the inherited getTrailingObjectsImpl is not hidden.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ParentType::getTrailingObjectsImpl;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These two functions are helper functions for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TrailingObjects::getTrailingObjects. They recurse to the left --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the result for each type in the list of trailing types depends on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the result of calling the function on the type to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left. However, the function for the type to the left is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implemented by a &#42;subclass&#42; of this class, so we invoke it via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the TopTrailingObj, which is, via the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// curiously-recurring-template-pattern, the most-derived type in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this recursion, and thus, contains all the overloads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NextTy &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl-d5dc5f9bc1738bd42d17ac7472482035/#a20f5f514b0855117c9f1bf769bcb627b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl-d5dc5f9bc1738bd42d17ac7472482035/#a20f5f514b0855117c9f1bf769bcb627b">getTrailingObjectsImpl</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseTy &#42;Obj,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">NextTy &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base case of the TrailingObjectsImpl inheritance recursion,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when there&#39;s no more trailing types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Align, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BaseTy, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TopTrailingObj, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl-f152aa7dffaf4bdddb30d999871bbd91"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">alignas(Align) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsimpl">TrailingObjectsImpl</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, BaseTy, TopTrailingObj, PrevTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trailing-objects-internal/trailingobjectsbase">TrailingObjectsBase</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a dummy method, only here so the &quot;using&quot; doesn&#39;t fail --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it will never be called, because this function recurses backwards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up the inheritance chain to subclasses.</span></CodeLine>
